task.title: Setup environment variables on a Windows System
task.shortdesc: On Windows, the only things to do is to add an environment variable named JAVA_HOME.

step.cmd: On menu contextual menu, select Properties
Edit or create a new entry named JAVA_HOME.
JAVA_HOME must point to where the JDK software is located, for example: C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_14
